title: Today is the day, the day of remembrance
body:
One year ago, Riot stripped our home from us and forced us to relocate to their Reddit style boards.  Since then I think we've made good progress especially with FEK improvements, but many great things are still lost and we've truly never been the same.

Let us take a moment of silence to remember

http://i.imgur.com/aWDnWmf.png

http://i.imgur.com/Q25Zu5x.jpg
